name: zangano-demo
description: TypeScript AST viewer and Advance Query editor

scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.build-dev-no-maps: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash  --no-source-maps
scripts.build-dev: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash
scripts.build-app: npm run clean && npm run build-only && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/cannabis/zangano-demo/ && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/cannabis/zangano-demo/*' && mv docs/* ../../demos/docs/cannabis/zangano-demo/
scripts.build-only: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build && sh build-workers.sh && node --max-old-space-size=5000 node_modules/parcel/bin/cli.js build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report  --no-source-maps --public-url './'
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build-app

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
